event.description:
Bhavya, a young 20 year old is an Indie Pop Singer/Songwriter hailing from New Delhi. Composing since age 10 and writing songs since the age of 15, his songs are both in Hindi and English and often Bilingual too. His debut music video - 'Spexy Girl' has been running on MTV INDIES.   
 
Bhavya does renditions of popular artists from the likes of Bon Iver, Passenger, Tom Odell, Coldplay, James Brown, Daft Punk, Sam Smith, Louis Armstrong, Michael Jackson and A R Rahman. His songwriting on the other hand, incorporates a variety of influences such as Acoustic Folk, Pop Rock and R & B. He likes to write songs about different kinds of dynamics of human relationships, existence and the complications within and has been known to bring a soulful and mellow vibe with his originals as well as a certain foot-tapping groove.
event.title: Bhavya Raj
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Artist Name: Nihar Manwatkar 
Insta/Youtube: A Dog Without A Bone 
Show name: Nihar Manwatkar : Howling at the Piano 
 
Nihar Manwatkar (@adogwithoutabone) is a singer-songwriter from Pune, currently based out of Delhi-NCR. His music sees influences from different eras, with some of his immediate inspirations being Leonard Cohen, Sixto Rodriguez, Elliot Smith, John Mayer, Paolo Nutini, Ray Charles, Louis Armstrong, Bon Iver, Andrew Bird, The Nationals. His shows are intimate and highly engaging which include collaborations, conversations, storytelling and of course, music.
event.title: A Dog Without A Bone
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Circlelost is a Pop/Rock trio based in Guwahati/Delhi with Amitabh Barooa on Vocals and Piano, Siddharth Barroa on Bass and Nishant Hagjer on Drums. They released their first song 'None to Wake Us' on 15th August 2016.  

Circlelost is the brainchild of Amitabh and Siddharth of the band Lucid Recess. This project essentially came into being to express a new side of them musically and to keep feeding their need to create more music. A few months after starting the work, Nishant Hagjer (Undying Inc., Underside and Rectified Spirit) joined them on the drums and they were ready.  

As musicians, the three are routinely involved in heavier forms of music, one more than the others. But their association as Circlelost is not just different but a very exciting change for all of them. What they are, at the core, is a simple pop/rock project with a tiny bit of soul/R&B. But with each song, what they incorporate within that is what makes it interesting.
event.title: Circlelost
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
About Voicestra

SANJEETA BHATTACHARYA is a Delhi based vocalist who recently graduated from the prestigious Berklee College of Music, Boston. She began her journey in music learning Hindustani Classical music for 8 years, simultaneously exploring the world of jazz, RnB, soul, bossa nova and flamenco. She has performed at various venues in India, Boston and Spain. Lately she has been sessioning with various acts around the country and is working on her Bulgarian folk choral project titled, Voicestra. 

ADITI MALHOTRA is an eighteen year old singer-songwriter who started singing at the age of five. She was trained in Hindustani Classical Music for nine years, and alongside, developed a keen interest in various genres such as jazz, soul, RnB, blues and soft rock. 

Blessed with a genuine sense of sound, VIKRAMADITYA NEGI made the most of his talent by carving it into a distinguished skill as he trained under Shri Ajay Kumar Pathak as a Hindustani Classical Dhrupad and Khayaal vocalist.
event.title: Voicestra (opening act by MG and Main)
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Artistes Unlimited is a platform for the promotion of performing arts, with Music as its core focus. 

Founded in New Delhi, India in 2003, AU has now become home to over 220 artistes as a space to Converge, Collaborate and Create. 

This collaborative spirit is evident not only in our numbers but also in our music – a seamless musical repertoire that spans Indian, Western and World Music. 
 
Experimentation is key to our Sound - a-cappella arrangements being our forte. In Feb 2006, we presented our first original Musical - thus bringing actors and dancers into the family! 

In 2008, AU's production Raise combined original and contemporary covers, along with pieces inspired by "Stomp" at the IIT. In 2009, we collaborated with contemporary dance for a three day musical extravaganza called "Continuum" which brought together songs across different decades and generations. 

After seven long years, AU is preparing for a new phase of performances and compositions.
event.title: Artistes Unlimited
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
'Crooner' is an American epithet given to male singers of jazz standards, mostly from the Great American Songbook, either backed by a full orchestra, a big band or by a piano. Originally it was an ironic term denoting an emphatically sentimental, often emotional singing style made possible by the use of microphones. (ref. Wiki)  

The only difference here is that the crooner is from India. And he performs in and out of songbooks.  

Nikhil Mawkin, a.k.a Senor Elefante, explores vocal based repertoire majorly and performs music ranging from various genres and languages, mainly in an environment created by acoustic/semi-acoustic instruments though.

Senor Elefante performs in duo/trio/band settings, depending on a particular scenario.  

For the show, he is accompanied by Nathalie Ramirez on flute.
event.title: Senor Elefante with Nathalie
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Delhi based Singer-Songwriter Guitarist, Abhinav seamlessly blends the elements of Pop, Indie, Soul & Blues music into a stirring sonic experience in the atmospheres of artists such as John Mayer & Eric Clapton and capturing visceral beats & dynamic rhythms of Chet Faker & Frank Ocean producing a powerful yet mellow sound. His main admission while writing music is to have his songs speak for his thoughts in melody. Keeping his sessions intimate and laid back, he takes the audience along with him on a musically & emotionally arresting experience.  

Accompanied Musician: 

Shiv Trisal, a well renowned and respected session guitarist is known for his work with Bands like The Electric Plant, Sane Demise, Propaganda, and the 'Shiv Trisal Project'. Being a multi-instrumentalist and having explored genres ranging from metal to blues, Shiv brings his varied studious musical personality and his studied musicianship to the room.
event.title: Abhinav Singh
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description: Hieronymo is Will Clark (bass/vocals), Sam Harrison (guitar/vocals) and Aman Kumar Singh (drums). With a sound like driving through the night, down an unforgiving highway while the radio switches on by the will of some unknown supernatural hand and out of the car speakers float vocal harmonies and lyrics on fatalism, out of body experience and time, Hieronymo transports the listener to a claustrophobic forest that watches you with a calculating ambivalence.
event.title: Hieronymo
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Abhind is a jazz trio founded by its bassist Pierre-Antoine Lasnier who creates original compositions to express his inner feelings and his journey through life from France to India. The band is composed of Shonai on the piano and Aniruddh Saha on the drums.  

Abhind's music is multiple and cannot be reduced to a single format or a particular shape  as it is the description of an around the world journey. It transcribes the multiplicity of life, emotions, people and places with a documentary shape through sounds.  

The first album of Abhind, "From Kolkata" represents the first part of the depiction of this journey. Even though Pierre-Antoine Lasnier is actually from Paris, France, the compositions where made in the capital of Bengal in India and find their roots in this city. They are the description of the first part of the journey and its conclusion.  

The compositions were made in 2016 while the album will be available at the end of 2017.
event.title: Abhind
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
The Latination is one of the only virtuoso and genuine Latin jazz band in India. The quartet is a powerful and soulful collaboration between French and Indian specialists of jazz and Latin music. The Latination has already performed all over India (Delhi, Pune, Bangalore, Chennai, Kolkata, Chandigarh, Bhopal, Kolkata, Kathmandu, etc.) and received accolades and great critics from audiences and fellow musicians. 

Its repertoire ranges from the festive sounds of salsa and rumba to modern jazz, blending the dance-compelling power of Afro-Latin rhythms with the intellectual streams of dense harmonies and sophisticated melodies, the discreet sweetness of jazz ballads and Latin boleros with virtuoso improvisation, solo performances. Their music delights both attentive jazz listening audience and festive dancing crowd. 

Members of the band :

Emmanuel Simon (Conga & Percussion) 
Pradyumna Singh Manot a.k.a. Paddy (Keyboards) 
Premjit Dutta (Timbales) 
Bijit Bhattacharya (Bass guitar)
event.title: The Latination
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
International Jazz Day is a yearly event on 30 April, organized by UNESCO to celebrate “the virtues of jazz as an educational tool, and a force for peace, unity, dialogue and enhanced cooperation among people.” Celebrate the day at The Piano Man Jazz Club with the fabulous Latin jazz band, The Latination! (Hosted by Madhur Daga)

About the band:

The Latination is one of the only virtuoso and genuine Latin jazz band in India. The quartet is a powerful and soulful collaboration between French and Indian specialists of jazz and Latin music. The Latination has already performed all over India and received accolades and great critics from audiences and fellow musicians.   
 
Its repertoire ranges from the festive sounds of salsa and rumba to modern jazz, blending the dance-compelling power of Afro-Latin rhythms with the intellectual streams of dense harmonies and sophisticated melodies, the discreet sweetness of jazz ballads and Latin boleros with virtuoso improvisation, solo performances.
event.title: International Jazz Day with The Latination
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Akash Vincent is a singer-songwriter living in New Delhi. He started his musical training on drums, which he played throughout high school and college. He first felt drawn to songwriting during sessions with his college band. In these practices he realized he had a strong imagination and clear vision for how he wanted to craft the songs and decided to write songs under his own name. 

He recorded his songs on his own at first, at one point playing each instrument himself, but it wasn't until he met drummer and co-producer Nikhil Mawkin and bassist Abhinav Khokhar that he found the synergy he was looking for. This led to the release of Akash's first EP, titled Postcards. With its release on 10th January 2015, Postcards introduced Akash to the music community in Delhi as a singer-songwriter and guitar player with a refreshing and honest sound.
event.title: Akash Vincent
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Muzaffer Ali is a Delhi based singer & songwriter. He started playing the guitar and singing from the age of 11. After singing for a few competitions, in 2015, he started performing professionally and played at various clubs & five star restaurants all over Delhi including: Q’la, I Kandy, Latest Recipe, Zu Tisch, Fat Lulu's, The Roost, Indian Palate Fest and many more.  

His original song 'No more tears' was featured in HeForShe Event by United Nations held in Delhi University in 2015. In early 2016, he moved to Mumbai and did a few shows in Sun n Sand Hotel & he’s now back in Delhi.  

His singing is inspired from all the old legends including Elvis Presley, John Lennon, Billy Joel, Janis Joplin, Bob Dylan, Don Mclean, Eric Clapton, Neil Diamond, Elton John, Chris De Burgh, Lionel Richie, Ronan Keating and some new ones include Passenger, Coldplay, Adele, Ed Sheeran, John Mayer and more.  

He has an Acoustic Duo with his partner Amit Awasthi and together they are called Crayonn.
event.title: Muzaffer Ali
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
The 'Ashish Ddavidd Collective' is a Trio project which has Meingoulung Bariam on guitars and backup vocals, Stephen Gilbert on percussions and Ashish Ddavidd on lead vocals! They draw their individual inspirations from Country, Blues, Rock, Pop and some Gospel as well, considering they all met for the first time in a Church! 

Ashish Ddavidd is a baritone vocalist, music producer and radio jockey! His collective radio experience spans a decade and 4 National Radio Networks! He has sung with many well known and critically acclaimed bands like 'Them Clones', 'Euphoria' and 'Artists Unlimited' to name a few. He also has vast experience in Musical Theater and has worked with late Babush Santana, George Pulinkala on over 10 musical theatrical productions as well. 

Ashish's live performances are interactive, fun and very lively where he takes requests, interacts, cracks jokes & sings well known numbers which instantly connect with the audience!
event.title: The Ashish Ddavidd Collective
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Kumail Hamid is a young music producer, who has been experimenting with music that can only be classified under the ambiguous label of “electronic music”. His music boldly pushes the level of experimentation of the current “scene” beyond its club friendly confines, exploring the more ethereal regions of sound. Heavily manipulated live recordings coupled with atmospheric synths and meticulously panned rhythm sections form the fundamental characteristics of his music.  

His live act ranges from ambient soundscapes to his more recent, Hip-Hop influenced beats. So far, Kumail has released two well received EP’s and his most recent, very colourful full length album titled ‘Links’.  

Kumail has played for major festivals such as Magnetic Fields, where he shared the line up with Shigeto, DJ Koze, Ratatat, Kutmah and Garden City Movement. He has also had the privilege to play at festivals such as Sunburn (Goa), Bass Camp, Future Theory Festival and Appa Art Festival in Kamshet.
event.title: Kumail
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Samanvay, a young 19 year old is a Singer-Songwriter and Guitarist from New Delhi. He has been writing songs in English and Hindi since the age of 14. Samanvay is a self taught vocalist, guitarist and acoustic percussionist. Hugely inspired by Grammy Winning Artist, Ed Sheeran, Acoustic Pop is one of his strong genres.  

He has been a vital part of many projects from different genres, ranging from Pop, Rock, Metal and Fusion. His set list includes tracks from artist like Ed Sheeran, Charlie Puth, Coldplay, Eric Clapton, The Beatles, Zayn, Jamie Lawson, Jason Mraz, Bruno Marz, Kodaline etc. and a variety of original compositions. He is currently recording an EP which is set to hit the floor later this year.  

He has played at numerous venues in the NCR region including venues like The Hungry Monkey, The Piano Man Jazz Club, Boheme, The Chatter House, Tabula Beach Café, Turquoise Cottage and many more.
event.title: Samanvay
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description: Tanya Nambiar is a Delhi based singer/songwriter. Her music is a smooth blend of jazz, blues and pop. Her music has received great reviews from Indian and international music blogs. Accompanying her is Vishal Dixit on the keyboard.

event.description: Angad Katari is a Delhi based Indie Singer/Songwriter. From being a drummer in the past to a singer/songwriter, he released his Single titled “I loved you” along with the Video, on the 11th of Feb and will be releasing his Album titled “LOST”, in June'17. Angad’s music has more of an acoustic feel to it, he prefers to keep the arrangement of his songs as simple and catchy as he can get them to be. His music/songs are a blend of Indie-pop, Country, Rock, Alternative and Blues.
event.title: Angad Katari
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Time Wise is an Experimental Jazz Fusion band from Ahmedabad, formed in 2015. We perform Jazz standards with a twist of our own and love to experiment with crisp rhythms and mellow tunes in our original compositions. 

Most of what we play and compose is organically random, and usually, a lot of fun! When we do record, we make sure to stay true to the performance and the audience, so we only record live, without overdubs or gimmicks. The reason we do this is because we believe that music in today's world is too perfect – due to the overuse of the technology at our disposal. Our music online, is raw and uncut, just like you would hear it live.   

The band comprises of seven band members with Dhaivat Jani on Drums, Sahil Abhichandani on Vocals, Harmony Signaporia on Vocals, Raag Sethi on Guitars, Harmish Joshi on Saxaphone, Mark Damania on Bass Guitar and Nayan Kapadia on Keyboards.
event.title: Time Wise
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.description:
Amuze Records presents in association with The Piano Man Jazz Club, The Foxtrot Project V2 album release gig, Delhi.  

The artist line-up: 

       1. Neel Sarkar Project (Shantiniketan) 
       2. The Rohan Ganguli Quartet 
       3. Shonai 
       4. The Bodhisattwa Trio 
       5. Syncopation (Delhi) 

FEATURED ARTIST for the evening: 

Neel Sarkar Project (Shantiniketan): Neel Sarkar is a classically trained Indian music composer and instrumentalist. The band has been featured by French cultural centre 'Alliance du Francais' in India for their last album and tour project Zikr which was released by Amuze Records. 

About The Foxtrot Project: 

The Jazz compilation album, The FOXTROT Project is a collective of different contemporary Jazz musicians. The album is the first release from the Kolkata based independent record label Amuze Records.  The view of making this compilation is to capture the contemporary and experimental sound of the Jazz music that is being created in India.
event.title: The Foxtrot Project V2 ft. Neel Sarkar Project
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

       5. Syncopation (Delhi) 

FEATURED ARTIST for the evening: 

Syncopation (Delhi): This is a Delhi based Funk/Jazz/Blues trio featuring guitarist/composer Rishie Sachdeva with drummer Nikhil Vasudevan and bassist Jayant Manchanda. Their band is a critically famous band for their style of music in and outside India. 

About The Foxtrot Project: 

he Jazz compilation album, The FOXTROT Project is a collective of different contemporary Jazz musicians. The album is the first release from the Kolkata based independent record label Amuze Records.  The view of making this compilation is to capture the contemporary and experimental sound of the Jazz music that is being created in India these days.
event.title: The Foxtrot Project V2 ft. Syncopation

event.description:
KohlArt & The Piano Man present, a new, awesome way to spend your weekend. Learn how to recreate masterpieces under the guidance of fabulous artists and go home with something you can hang on your wall and beam about! 

Spread over 3 hours, P&V can be enjoyed with friends, as a group activity, with a loved one or alone, as a space to meet other interesting people while painting up a storm. 

What could make this better? Wine, of course! Enjoy the afternoon with great wine, sangria and delicious pizzas from Dirty Apron. 

All the materials required to paint will be provided, all we want, as always, is your undivided attention and love for culture! 

The painting selected (shown in the poster) for this session is Untitled (Two Women) by B. Prabha. 

Time: 14:30 – 17:30  
Cost: 3000/- inclusive of material, wine and pizza, artist fee, taxes etc.
event.title: Paint & Vineyard
